articles.title: 'Cat Person' and the problem with having sex with someone just to 'get it over with' - USA TODAY
articles.description: Experts warn having sex should never feel like something you should just "get over with," like in the film "Cat Person."
articles.content:
Not everyone is always in the mood for sex. But what happens when you do it anyway, just to "get it over with?"
A moment like this sticks out in "Cat Person," a new film based on the viral New Yorke… [+3840 chars]
